system.description:
This spell creates a magical, invisible doorway that only the spellcaster may use. It forms a passage through up to 10 feet of non-living solid material (wall, floor, ceiling, or ground). The door cannot be created in living objects.

Mechanics & Rules:

  • The door is invisible and can only be detected by Detect Magic.
  • It cannot be destroyed except by Dispel Magic (normal chances for success).
  • The passage remains until it has been used seven times (each one-way passage counts as a use) or is dispelled.
